name: Share-free-docs
tagline: This is a notes sharing platform for teachers,student and college
body:
### Welcome
Share Free Docs is a note sharing platform for teachers, student, and college.  This project is more like a social networking site that can be used by faculty to share the record, study material, notice to the student. A student can also communicate with another student.

### Installation guideline
1) download the sharefreedocs folder
2) download the sql file and install it.
3) edit the config file in function folder according to the database configuration.
4) then open the index.php file.

### Admin Panel
You can open the admin panel using the following link:
urwebsitename/sharefreedocs/admin/index.php
login information: 
username: mohit
password: mohit

### Contribution
If you like to make some modification to the existing you can. I will be glad to modify it if your modification enhance the performance of site to add more features to the site.

### Support or Contact
You can contact on the following email address
mohithamgaonkar@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
